The velocity vector <math alttext="v sub C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> of a cyclist moving at a direction of <math alttext="15.0 degrees" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>15.0</mn><mi>Â°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> east of north is also shown. Which of the following vectors could represent the velocity of the cyclist as seen by someone on the train?

choices.label: An arrow points in the northeast direction.
An extended arrow points in the northwest direction.

content.answer: An extended arrow points in the northwest direction.
